plot: The local building-contractor Martin Roumagnac is fascinated by the fashionable Blanche Ferrand. To impress Blache, Martin presents her with a villa. However, this ruins him financially. ...
title: Martin Roumagnac
plot_es: The local building-contractor Martin Roumagnac is fascinated by the fashionable Blanche Ferrand. To impress Blache, Martin presents her with a villa. However, this ruins him financially. ...
plot_en: The local building-contractor Martin Roumagnac is fascinated by the fashionable Blanche Ferrand. To impress Blache, Martin presents her with a villa. However, this ruins him financially. ...

cast.role: Martin Roumagnac - un petit entrepreneur de maçonnerie
cast.name: Jean Gabin

cast.role: Le surveillant du collège - épris de Blanche
cast.name: Daniel Gélin
